newsitem.title: THAILAND: Thai interbank rate steady, baht firmer late.
newsitem.headline: Thai interbank rate steady, baht firmer late.

text.p: The Thai overnight interbank rate was steady at 13.00 percent in late trade on Friday, unchanged from earlier and late Thursday, dealers said.
"There were some funds being offered at the interbank rate of 12.50 baht," said one dealer at a foreign bank.

The rate is expected to move in narrow range next week as some strong demand for funds to meet the next central bank reserve requirement for banks on the Oct 7 will prevent any sharp fall in the rate, dealers said.
The baht edged up to 25.407-25.412 to the dollar from 25.415-25.420 earlier as the dollar eased slightly against majors in the afternoon, dealers said.
"There was some activity in the afternoon after very quiet trade in the morning. The market was very dull today," said one currency dealer.
The one-month dollar/baht swap premium was steady at 10.00/11.00 satangs late compared with 10.00/10.70 in early morning.
The Bank of Thailand fixed the mid-rate at 25.41 to the dollar against 25.40 on Thursday.
